titles.title: January 6th Oral History Project Act
January 6th Oral History Project Act

To direct the American Folklife Center at the Library of Congress to establish an oral history program to collect certain video and audio recordings of personal histories and testimonials and written materials with respect to individuals who were affected by the events at the United States Capitol on January 6, 2021, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
